dfischer.utils

Class AlertConfigGenericNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.utils.AlertConfigGenericNotification
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlertConfigGenericCancelableNotification, AlertConfigNotificationJobEndAvResponseTimeOfSlowestPageExceeded, AlertConfigNotificationJobEndAvResponseTimePerPageExceeded, AlertConfigNotificationJobEndInfo, AlertConfigNotificationJobEndSessionFailureRateExceeded, AlertConfigNotificationJobInternalError, AlertConfigNotificationJobStartFailed, AlertConfigNotificationJobStartInfo, AlertConfigNotificationPeriodicIntervalInfo, AlertGenericNotificationInstance

    public abstract class AlertConfigGenericNotification
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract basis class for all configuration data of alert notifications. Generic placeholders
    • {$timestamp}: date and time when the alert was created
    • {$generator}: name of the Exec Agent or name of the Cluster
    • {$programName}: name of the executed program
    • {$jobId}: ID of the job

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DATA_TYPE_GENERIC
      Notification data type: gerneric (instance of AlertConfigGenericNotification) - the notification can be created at runtime, for example inside a load test plug-in (value = 1).
      static int DATA_TYPE_GENERIC_CANCELABLE
      Notification data type: gerneric (instance of AlertConfigGenericCancelableNotification) - the notification can be created at runtime, for example inside a load test plug-in (value = 2).
      static int DATA_TYPE_JOB_ALERT_INTERNAL_ERROR
      Notification data type: internal error during job execution (value = 12).
      static int DATA_TYPE_JOB_ALERT_START_FAILED
      Notification data type: start of job failed (value = 10).
      static int DATA_TYPE_JOB_END_ALERT_AV_RESPONSE_TIME_PER_PAGE
      Notification data type: end of job: limit of average response time per page exceeded (value = 32).
      static int DATA_TYPE_JOB_END_ALERT_AV_RESPONSE_TIME_SLOWEST_PAGE
      Notification data type: end of job: limit of average response time of slowest page exceeded (value = 33).
      static int DATA_TYPE_JOB_END_ALERT_SESSION_FAILURE_RATE
      Notification data type: end of job: limit of session failure rate exceeded (value = 31).
      static int DATA_TYPE_JOB_END_INFO
      Notification data type: end of job information (value = 30).
      static int DATA_TYPE_JOB_START_INFO
      Notification data type: start of job information (value = 11).
      static int DATA_TYPE_NOTYPE
      Notification data type: undefined notification data type (value = -1).
      static int DATA_TYPE_PERIODIC_ALERT_AV_RESPONSE_TIME_PER_PAGE
      Notification data type: limit of average response time per page exceeded during job execution (value = 22).
      static int DATA_TYPE_PERIODIC_ALERT_AV_RESPONSE_TIME_SLOWEST_PAGE
      Notification data type: limit of average response time of slowest page exceeded during job execution (value = 23).
      static int DATA_TYPE_PERIODIC_ALERT_SESSION_FAILURE_RATE
      Notification data type: limit of session failure rate exceeded during job execution (value = 21).
      static int DATA_TYPE_PERIODIC_INFO
      Notification data type: information during job execution (value = 20).
      static int NOTIFICATION_TYPE_CANCELLED
      Notification type: alert cancelled (value = 9).
      static int NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ERROR
      Notification type: error(s) measured (value = 1).
      static int NOTIFICATION_TYPE_INFO
      Notification type: information message (value = 10).
      static int NOTIFICATION_TYPE_INTERNAL_ERROR
      Notification type: internal error (value = 0).
      static int NOTIFICATION_TYPE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
      Notification type: limit if measured value exceeded (value = 5).
      static int NOTIFICATION_TYPE_NOTYPE
      Notification type: undefined notification type (value = -1).

      • getCreationTimeStamp

        public final long getCreationTimeStamp()
        Transient: Get the timestamp when the (real) alert was created.
        Note: this information is transient and not stored inside the XML configuration data.
        Returns:
        the timestamp when the (real) alert was created (milliseconds since January 1, 1970, GMT).

      • setCreationTimeStamp

        public final void setCreationTimeStamp(long creationTimeStamp)
        Transient: Allows to modify the timestamp when the (real) alert was created. The default value is System.currentTimeMillis().
        Note: this information is transient and not stored inside the XML configuration data.
        Parameters:
        creationTimeStamp - the timestamp when the (real) alert was created (milliseconds since January 1, 1970, GMT).

      • getMessageTextHTML

        public final java.lang.String getMessageTextHTML()
        Transient: Return the HTML message text of a released alert.
        Note: this information is transient and not stored inside the XML configuration data.
        Returns:
        the HTML message text of a released alert, or an empty string if no value is configured

      • setMessageTextHTML

        public final void setMessageTextHTML(java.lang.String messageTextHTML)
        Transient: Set the HTML message text of a released alert.
        Note: this information is transient and not stored inside the XML configuration data.
        Parameters:
        messageTextHTML - the HTML message text of a released alert

      • getEmbeddedHtmlImages

        public AlertConfigGenericNotificationEmbeddedHtmlImage[] getEmbeddedHtmlImages()
        Transient: Get all embedded images of the HTML message text.
        Returns:
        all embedded images of the HTML message text, or an empty array if no images are embedded inside the HTML message text.

      • addEmbeddedHtmlImage

        public void addEmbeddedHtmlImage(AlertConfigGenericNotificationEmbeddedHtmlImage htmlImage)
        Transient: Add an embedded image to the HTML message text. This method can be called several times which allows to add multiple images.
        Note: this information is transient and not stored inside the XML configuration data.
        Parameters:
        htmlImage - the image to be added to the HTML message text.

      • writeObject

        public void writeObject(java.io.DataOutputStream dout)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Transient: Write the object of a (real) alert notification to a stream.
        Note: this method is not used to write the configuration data to the XML configuration file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readObject

        public void readObject(java.io.DataInputStream din)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Transient: Read the object of a (real) alert notification from a stream.
        Note: this method is not used to read the configuration data from the XML configuration file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
